senselogic.sitevision.api.security

Interface RoleMatcher


  • public interface RoleMatcher
    Role matcher representation that can be matched on a node to check "is user in role".

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via RoleMatcherBuilder.build(). See RoleMatcherBuilder for how to obtain an instance of the RoleMatcherBuilder interface.

    Since:
    Sitevision 6.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean matchesAll(Node aNode)
      Checks if matcher user is in all matcher roles on a given Node.
      boolean matchesAny(Node aNode)
      Checks if matcher user is in any matcher role on a given Node.

    • Method Detail

      • matchesAll

        boolean matchesAll(Node aNode)
        Checks if matcher user is in all matcher roles on a given Node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the node, typically a sv:page
        Returns:
        true if matcher "user is in role" for all of the matcher roles on aNode, false otherwise

      • matchesAny

        boolean matchesAny(Node aNode)
        Checks if matcher user is in any matcher role on a given Node.
        Parameters:
        aNode - the node, typically a sv:page
        Returns:
        true if matcher "user is in role" for any of the matcher roles on aNode, false otherwise

Sitevision - Portal and Content Management Made Easy
Sitevision is an advanced Java enterprise portal product and a portlet container (JSR 286) that implements Java Content Repository (JSR 283).
